Header.paragraph: At Contact Foot Clinic we aim to provide excellent care and promise to treat every patient as an individual at all times

Services.name: General Foot Health
Services.text: Regular foot health maintenance appointment enables patients to dramatically reduce the likelihood of foot complications such as ingrowing nails, hard skin and more.

Services.name: Nail Surgery
Services.text: A nail condition that cannot be resolved by routine care at the clinic, surgery could be offered as a solution. Surgery helps relieve any pain and prevent infections caused by the toenail.

Services.name: Shockwave Therapy
Services.text: Shockwave therapy is an effective form of treatment for chronic musculoskeletal pain. It is a non invasive alternative to surgery, injections & oral medication. It increases the blood flow to the injured area in intense, short waves.

Services.name: Swift Treatment
Services.text: Swift is a new technology, developed in the UK, which has been licensed for the general treatment of Verruca and skin lesions in Podiatry and Dermatology. Swift uses microwave energy which is delivered through a special probe applied to the skin to treat the affected tissue.

Services.name: Steroid Injections
Services.text: Steroid injections are cortisone substance inserted into inflamed joints to provide pain relief from symptoms such as pain, swelling, inflammation in the foot and lower limb. Cortisone injections are usually given when patients haven't responded well to conservative management.

Services.name: Plantar Fasciitis
Services.text: Plantar fasciitis is one of the most common foot conditions. It is an overuse condition of the plantar fascia where it has been overworked, micro tears occur within the tissue and inflammation leads to discomfort. Our highly trained podiatrists are experts in heel pain assessment.

Testimonials.text: "From the moment I walked in, I felt welcomed. The staff is friendly, and the clinic is clean and modern. It’s clear they truly care about their patients’ well-being."
Testimonials.name: Simon D,. 73

Testimonials.text: "My father is in his 80s and receives regular foot care here. The team is gentle, patient, and thorough. We’re so grateful to have found such excellent care."
Testimonials.name: Thomas L., 45

Testimonials.text: "I’m a runner, and when I injured my foot, I was devastated. The podiatrist not only helped me recover but also taught me how to avoid re-injury. I’m back on track thanks to them!"
Testimonials.name: Kevin K., 29

Testimonials.text: "As a diabetic, I know how important foot care is. This clinic is exceptional—they monitor everything closely and take proactive steps to prevent issues. I trust them completely."
Testimonials.name: Linda M., 47

Testimonials.text: "I never realized how much custom orthotics could improve my daily life. The team took the time to explain everything and ensured the fit was perfect. I can walk without pain again!"
Testimonials.name: Jason T., 31

Testimonials.text: "I was nervous about getting treatment for an ingrown toenail, but the staff made me feel completely at ease. The procedure was quick and virtually painless. Highly recommend!"
Testimonials.name: Elena R., 55
